com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Interface ClassificationModelTrainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassificationMultiModelTrainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearSVMModelTrainer, MaxentModelTrainer, PerceptronClassificationModelTrainer

    public interface ClassificationModelTrainer
    Trains a machine learning classification model for a given CorpusEventStream.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCutoff()
      Statistical cutoff for feature inclusion: features must appear at least this many times to be included in the model.
      void setCutoff(int cutoff) 
      void setParameters(Config config)
      Set parameters for this trainer type.
      ClassificationModel trainModel(ClassificationEventStream corpusEventStream, java.util.List<java.lang.String> featureDescriptors)
      Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
      ClassificationModel trainModel(ClassificationEventStream corpusEventStream, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> descriptors)
      Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.

    • Method Detail

      • trainModel

        ClassificationModel trainModel(ClassificationEventStream corpusEventStream,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> featureDescriptors)
                        throws TalismaneException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
        Parameters:
        corpusEventStream - the event stream containing the events to be used for training
        featureDescriptors - the feature descriptors required to apply this model to new data.
        Throws:
        TalismaneException
        java.io.IOException

      • trainModel

        ClassificationModel trainModel(ClassificationEventStream corpusEventStream,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> descriptors)
                        throws TalismaneException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
        Parameters:
        corpusEventStream - the event stream containing the events to be used for training
        descriptors - all of the descriptors required to perform analysis using this model (e.g. feature descriptors, etc.)
        Throws:
        TalismaneException
        java.io.IOException

      • getCutoff

        int getCutoff()
        Statistical cutoff for feature inclusion: features must appear at least this many times to be included in the model. Note that for numeric features, any value > 0 counts as 1 occurrence for cutoff purposes.

      • setCutoff

        void setCutoff(int cutoff)

      • setParameters

        void setParameters(Config config)
        Set parameters for this trainer type.
